subject: Re: Frank S
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
The Speakjet is a voice synth chip. It's an attempt to make a 
portable EVPmaker like device. I use all methods, but just when the 
whim hits. Last night seemed like a good time to use the RS radio. 
There's times when one method or another doesn't work, so I switch to 
something else.

 Frank-S 

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Ralph Smith" <Ralphsmi@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Frank,
> 
>  How did you make out with the 12-470 Frank ? I have that one and I 
> don't get much on it. I do better with the old 12-469 and the 20-
125 
> from Radio Shack. Have a good one Frank. Oh by the way what is a 
> Speaker jet I think you people were talking about it? Thanks.
>  
> Regards,
> 
> Ralph the Ghost Hunter
> S.P.I.R.I.T. Paranormal Investigation Team
>
